item.description:
Please note: This is for the 21 and over crowd!

Viele von euch haben oft gefragt "Wo konnen wir zusammen ein Bier trinken"?

Endlich besuchen wir wieder The Hartford Saengerbund Society, a private German-American club. BITTE RSVP so we will know how many seats to save.

This is their opening Friday for the season, so there should be many people there. Ich hoffe dass ein ganze Menge von euch kommen werden.

If you want to carpool or get lost, Dianne's cellphone is 860.233.3079

Please, when you get there identify yourself as part of "Dianne's Kaffeeklatsch" and a club member will come to sign you in.  (This is a formality required by the State of Ct.)  They are having a dinner on this evening which you can purchase or just buy à la carte or just ein Glas Bier, bitte. The choir will be practicing downstairs, and we might get to hear a German song or two.

If you don't know where it is (and many people don't) you can call Dianne.  She is willing to carpool from West Hartford.

You can use GPS of course, but here are simple directions:

From West Hartford, get on New Britain Ave heading toward Hartford.  Pass under the only railroad bridge. Turn right at the first traffic light.  This is South St which changes its name to Main St in Newington. Drive until the next big intersection with traffic light.  Turn LEFT.  This is "Hartford Ave" and Route 176 although it doesn't look like a State highway. Turn left at the next traffic light.  This is North Mountain Rd which curves around like a "U".You will see DataMail and some other businesses and international clubs. About half-way around you will see the sign for the Saengerbund.

See, it's really not so difficult!
item.how_to_find_us: In the dining room on the right
item.name: Stammtisch
